recipe_name: Paleo and Vegan Tropical Acai Bowl for Two
recipe_ingredients_formatted: 7 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp (such as Sambazon®)
1 cup iced water, or as needed
recipe_directions_formatted: Place mango, pineapple, acai, water, and lime juice in a blender; pulse until smooth and creamy. Pour mixture into 2 bowls; sprinkle with shredded coconut and chia seeds. Drizzle with agave.

Combine yogurt, coconut water, strawberries, peaches, mango, banana, and 1 tablespoon chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour smoothie into a bowl and top with remaining 1 tablespoon chia seeds.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 4 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp (such as Sambazon®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Place frozen berries, almond milk, banana, and acai pulp in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into 2 bowls and top with granola, mango, strawberries, and kiwi slices. Drizzle with agave syrup.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 small apple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
1 small pear - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
¼ cup grated fresh coconut, divided
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine the banana, apple, and pear in an electric blender. Add ice cubes, skyr, all but one big spoonful of coconut, and spirulina.

Remove 3 or 4 balls of dragon fruit using a fruit baller, then add the remaining dragon fruit to the blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a bowl. Top with reserved dragon fruit balls and remaining coconut.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¾ cup coconut milk, or to taste
1 teaspoon agave syrup, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine mango, milk, banana, and agave syrup in a blender; blend until smooth.
Pour into a bowl. Garnish with rows of banana, pomegranate seeds, flaked coconut, and raspberries.

recipe_name: Protein Smoothie Bowl with Berries, Chocolate Chips, and Granola
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine strawberries, milk, 1/3 cup granola, blueberries, protein powder, and vanilla in a blender; blend until smooth.
Layer 1/2 of the chocolate chips on the bottom of a bowl. Pour smoothie over top, then sprinkle with remaining chocolate chips and remaining granola.
Blend 1/2 banana, peaches, applesauce, water, and coconut oil together in a blender until smooth; pour into a serving bowl.
Slice remaining half banana and arrange on top of smoothie. Add shredded coconut, almonds, and raisins.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 tablespoons frozen acai berry pulp, or as desired
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend strawberries, pineapple, yogurt, coconut water, and acai pulp in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl. Top smoothie with kiwi, banana, blueberries, raspberries, almonds, granola, and chia seeds.

Blend spinach, banana, coconut milk, mango, and coconut water in a blender until smooth. Pour smoothie into a bowl and top with raspberries, blueberries, granola, coconut flakes, almonds, and chia seeds.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend ice, 1/2 cup strawberries, 1 banana, blackberries, and apple juice together in a blender until smooth, adding more ice depending on your desired consistency. Pour smoothie into a bowl.
Top smoothie with remaining strawberries, remaining banana, blueberries, and granola. Drizzle honey over the top.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 4 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp (such as Sambazon®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Place almond milk, mango, bananas, rolled oats, and acai pulp in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into 2 bowls and top with chia seeds and drizzle with maple syrup.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1/2 cup Almond Breeze Unsweetened Vanilla Almondmilk
Optional Toppings: fresh berries, banana slices, toasted coconut, almonds, chia seeds, coconut granola
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine Almond Breeze Unsweetened Vanilla Almondmilk, spinach, berries, and banana in a blender. Blend until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with desired toppings, e.g. fresh berries, banana slices, toasted coconut, almonds, chia seeds, and granola. Eat with a spoon and enjoy!

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1/4 cup Almond Breeze Unsweetened Vanilla Almondmilk
1/4 cup sweetened or unsweetened coconut chips
recipe_directions_formatted: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

Spread out coconut chips on the prepared baking sheet in an even layer. Transfer to the oven to toast for 5 to 7 minutes, checking on it frequently. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and immediately transfer coconut chips to a small bowl (they’ll still keep toasting if you leave them on the sheet).

Combine bananas, strawberries, Almond Breeze Unsweetened Vanilla Almondmilk, and hemp protein in a blender. Pulse until pureed. If the mixture is too thick, add a splash of Almond Breeze Unsweetened Vanilla Almondmilk to help loosen the smoothie. The mixture should be slightly thicker than a traditional smoothie. Pour into a bowl and top with toasted coconut and sliced almonds.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 7 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp, partially defrosted in refrigerator overnight
¾ cup almond milk, or more as needed
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine acai, bananas, blueberries, almond milk, and honey in a blender. Blend until smooth. Smoothie should have a thick consistency, like frozen yogurt.
Pour into 2 bowls and top with banana slices, blueberries, pomegranate seeds, and coconut.

Place coconut milk, spinach, mango, banana, beet, coconut oil, parsley, turmeric, almond butter, maca powder, hemp hearts, chia seeds, bee pollen, cinnamon, ground ginger, salt, and pepper in a high-speed blender (such as Vitamix®). Blend until smooth.

Combine kale, spinach, strawberries, yogurt, banana, apple, and protein powder in a blender; pulse on low speed until ingredients are broken up and gently mixed. Increase to high speed, and blend until smooth and greens are broken down, 30 to 60 seconds.
Taste and add sugar if you like.
Combine spinach, 1 cup orange juice, peaches, pineapple, 1 halved banana, and green tea powder in a blender; blend until combined. Pour smoothie into a glass.
Rinse out the blender.
Combine 1 cup orange juice, raspberries, strawberries, and 1 halved banana in the blender; blend until combined. Pour berry smoothie into a separate glass.
Combine smoothies by pouring them at the same time from opposite sides of the serving glass.

Blend water, romaine lettuce, cucumber, avocado, celery, spinach, and lemon juice together in a blender on high until smooth, about 30 seconds. Add ice, apple, and banana to blender and blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.
Combine milk, yogurt, strawberries, mangos, matcha, honey, and spinach in a blender, in that order. Process until smooth. Make sure you don't over-blend, this can affect the quality of your smoothie!

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 ½ cups fresh spinach, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Place strawberries in a bowl; add warm water.
Blend milk and spinach together in a blender until smooth. Add blueberries, banana, and honey and blend until smooth. Add strawberries-water mixture and lemon juice and blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup chopped pitted dates, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend pineapple, coconut water, ice cubes, dandelion greens, coconut, cashews, and dates in a blender until smooth and creamy.
Combine kale and water in a blender; process until no chunks remain. Add banana, blueberries, pineapple, and mango; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup lightly packed baby spinach leaves
recipe_directions_formatted: Thaw frozen pineapple chunks for 5 minutes.
Combine pineapple chunks, spinach, yogurt, milk, and chia seeds in an electric blender and process until smooth, about 2 minutes.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 medium navel orange, peeled and cut into chunks
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine water, spinach, orange chunks, banana, and flaxseed in a blender; process until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup Nordica 1% or Fat Free Cottage Cheese
1 cup chopped frozen kale or spinach
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine cottage cheese, applesauce, kale, banana, water, ice, lemon juice, vanilla (if using) and cinnamon in a blender. Blend on high speed for 2 minutes or until very smooth. Serve immediately.
Pour water into a blender. Add tomato, carrot, kale, radishes, lemon, spirulina powder; top with ice cubes. Blend vegetable mixture until smooth.
Combine Granny Smith apple, spinach, blueberries, soy milk, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_name: Any Way You Want It Kale Smoothie
recipe_ingredients_formatted: 3  frozen strawberries, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend kale, yogurt, and peanuts together in a blender until smooth. Add milk, banana, strawberries, and maple syrup and blend until desired consistency is reached.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup ice, or as needed
½ cup water, or as needed
½ medium apple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
recipe_directions_formatted: Fill a glass with ice.
Blend spinach and water until smooth. Add apple, banana, and lemon juice; blend to desired consistency. Pour over ice.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup almond-coconut milk, or more if needed
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine kale, mango, pineapple, 1 cup almond-coconut milk, banana, chia seeds, and flax seed in a high-performance blender (such as Vitamix®); blend until smooth. Add more coconut milk beverage if mixture is too thick.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 cups fresh spinach leaves, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine spinach, 1 cup water, apple, pear, lemon juice, flaxseed, and ginger in a blender. Puree until smooth, adding more water if needed.

Layer yogurt, banana, and blueberries in a blender, respectively. Add as much spinach to blender that will fit; pour in water. Blend on high speed until smooth, adding the remaining spinach if needed. Add ice for a colder and thicker smoothie. Add more water for a thinner smoothie.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 tablespoon fresh blueberries, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Place apple, spinach, and chia seeds into a blender. Add almond milk and cinnamon and blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and top with blueberries.
Place the spinach in the freezer until frozen, at least 1 hour.
Combine the spinach, strawberries, banana, honey, and ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 4  ice cubes, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine mango chunks, lemon, spinach, zucchini, water, ice cubes, and coconut oil in a high-speed blender; blend until smooth.
Combine milk, yogurt, strawberries, banana, blueberries, green ice cube, whey, and honey in a blender, in the order listed. Blend until smooth.
Layer banana, mango, cucumber, spinach, cashew butter, and sesame seeds in a blender, in the order mentioned; add water. Blend until smoothie is desired consistency, adding more water if desired.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ⅓ cup milk, or more as needed
4  frozen strawberries, or more to taste
¼ teaspoon vanilla extract, or to taste (Optional)
recipe_directions_formatted: Put romaine lettuce into the bottom of a blender pitcher; add enough milk to cover completely and blend on High until smooth.

Drop one strawberry at a time into the blender while still running on High and allow the berry to blend completely before adding the next. Blend one banana chunk at a time into the mixture in the same manner as the strawberries. Thin the smoothie with additional milk to keep smoothie blending properly. Blend vanilla extract into the smoothie.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 (1 gram) packets Stevia In The Raw®
recipe_directions_formatted: In a blender, combine mango, kale, almond milk, orange juice, stevia, and chia seeds. Blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Add spinach leaves to a blender and finely chop. Add berry juice, blueberries, sour cream, sugar, blackberries, and ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately or refrigerate for later.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 5 cubes  ice, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine soy milk, spinach, protein powder, mint leaves, almonds, and ice in a blender cup; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¾ cup Almond Breeze Original or Unsweetened Original almondmilk
recipe_directions_formatted: Place all ingredients into blender and blend on high until smooth.

recipe_name: Green Banana and Peanut Butter Smoothie
recipe_ingredients_formatted: ⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or more to taste
1 cup rice milk, or as needed
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend oats and almonds in a blender until powdery; add spinach, banana, yogurt, peanut butter, and cinnamon. Blend, gradually adding rice milk, until desired consistency is reached.
Blend grapes, kale, and ice together in a blender until smooth.
Blend spinach, banana, apple, strawberries, mango, milk, protein powder, and honey together in a blender until smooth.
Blend grapefruit, water, spinach, ice cubes, ginger, and flax seeds in a blender or NutriBullet® until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 tablespoon powdered lemonade mix (such as Country Time®)
1 packet stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine spinach, mango, avocado, powdered lemonade mix, sugar substitute, and water in a blender; blend until thick and frothy.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup unsweetened apple juice, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Place spinach, bananas, tofu, coconut, peaches, pineapple, mango, and strawberries, respectively, in a blender; pour in apple juice. Blend until desired consistency is reached, adding more apple juice as necessary.
Combine spinach, strawberries, banana, almond milk, and agave in a blender; blend until smooth.
Combine watermelon, blueberries, banana, and cucumber in an electric blender and blend well. Add spinach last and blend until smoothie gets creamy, about 30 seconds.

recipe_name: Orange-Pear Green Smoothie with Bok Choy
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine pear, grapes, water, pineapple, banana, bok choy, kale, orange, ice, and mint in a large blender. Blend, starting on low speed and increasing to high, until smooth. Turn blender to liquefy setting for a smoother texture.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 cups Almond Breeze Hint of Honey almondmilk
1 large kiwi fruit, peeled and chopped
recipe_directions_formatted: Place all ingredients in large blender container in order given. Cover; blend on high 15 to 20 seconds or until completely smooth. Pour into glasses.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup frozen strawberries, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend kale, banana, coconut milk, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup water, or more as needed
½ medium avocado, pitted and scooped from shell
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine coconut milk, water, ice cubes, avocado, spinach, erythritol, MCT oil, and vanilla powder in a blender. Blend until smooth.

recipe_name: Agua Fresca de Pina y Espinacas (Pineapple Spinach Agua Fresca)
recipe_ingredients_formatted: 4 packets stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine pineapple, spinach, and sweetener in a blender. Add 2 cups water and blend until smooth.
Pour into a pitcher and add the remaining 4 cups water.
Combine banana, berries, kale, orange juice, water, almonds, and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth, about 20 to 30 seconds.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup almond milk, or as needed
recipe_directions_formatted: Place pineapple, kale, and banana in a blender; add almond milk. Blend until smooth.
Blend pineapple juice, spinach, pear, apple, avocado, and broccoli florets together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup spinach, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Place almond milk, clementine, raspberries, spinach, chia seeds, flaxseed meal, blueberries, and protein powder in a blender, respectively. Blend on high until smooth, about 30 seconds.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 leaf kale, torn into several pieces
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend orange in a blender until mostly juice.
Add water and kale; blend again on High speed until kale is liquefied.
Break bananas into chunks and add to the blender. Start blending at a lower speed until banana is incorporated. Increase speed to blend the mixture into a pudding-like texture.

recipe_name: Kale, Banana, and Peanut Butter Smoothie
recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 ½ cups unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk
½ bunch kale - stems removed and discarded, leaves torn into bite-size pieces
4 cubes  ice, or more if desired
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend bananas, almond milk, kale, ice, and peanut butter in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 3 cups ice cubes, or as desired
2 cups baby spinach leaves, or to taste
½ cup water, or to taste
10  fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend ice, spinach, pineapple, water, banana, orange, mint, lemon juice, and lime juice in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 15  seedless red grapes, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Pour water into a Vitamix blender. Add grapes, banana, pear, orange, spinach, ground flax seeds, and ice, in that order. Blend until smooth and creamy.

recipe_name: 10 Kale Smoothie Recipes That Pack a Powerfully Healthy Punch

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup ice cubes, or as needed (Optional)
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine ice cubes, zucchini, banana, and orange juice in a blender. Blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½  apple - peeled, cored, and diced, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Place watermelon in a blender; mix until liquefied. Add spinach, broccoli, cucumber, apple, and celery; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
1 cup baby spinach leaves, tightly packed
½ cup cored and chopped green apple
recipe_directions_formatted: Place oats, coconut milk, spinach, parsley, apple, honey, lemon juice, and ice in a blender and blend until smooth.
Blend milk, yogurt, banana, peanut butter, spinach, and ice cubes until smooth.
Blend banana, avocado, spinach, milk, ice cubes, honey, and vanilla together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup light unsweetened soy milk
recipe_directions_formatted: Gather all ingredients.
Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
Place kale, banana, soy milk, flax seeds, and maple syrup into a blender.
Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
Cover and purée until smooth.
Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
Serve over ice.
Dotdash Meredith Food Studios

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup fresh spinach, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend berries, yogurt, orange juice, spinach, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.
Combine spinach, almond milk, kale, peanut butter, and chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth. Add banana and blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ teaspoon finely grated orange zest
recipe_directions_formatted: Place banana, pineapple, carrot, hemp seeds, ginger, orange zest, cinnamon, coconut milk, and water in a blender in the order listed; blend on high until creamy and smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1  cinnamon graham cracker, crushed and divided
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend almond milk, pumpkin, ice cubes, banana, brown sugar, 1/2 the crushed cinnamon graham cracker, wheat germ, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth. Garnish individual servings with remaining graham cracker crumbs.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 4 cubes  ice, or more if desired
⅓ cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt
½  frozen banana, cut into chunks
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend ice, milk, pumpkin puree, yogurt, banana, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, allspice, and vanilla in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ⅔ cup unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk
1 ½ teaspoons brown sugar, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Place apple in a plastic microwave-safe bowl; pour in enough water to cover 1/4-inch of the bottom of bowl. Partially cover bowl with a lid or paper towel. Microwave in 1 minute intervals until apple is softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Freeze apple in the same container with water until solid, 2 hours to overnight.
Blend frozen apple, almond milk, and pumpkin puree in a blender until smooth; add brown sugar and pumpkin pie spice. Blend until smooth. Add ice and blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup coarsely chopped fresh beet
1 (6 ounce) container lemon non-fat Greek yogurt
recipe_directions_formatted: Place all ingredients in Oster® Versa® Performance Blender in order listed.
Select programmed SMOOTHIE setting.
Serve immediately.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 3  whole frozen strawberries, or more to taste
¼ cup whipped cream, or more to taste (Optional)
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend banana, strawberries, milk, yogurt, pumpkin puree, peanut butter, brown sugar, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, and nutmeg in a blender until smooth; add ice cubes and again blend until smooth. Pour smoothie into 4 glasses and top with whipped cream and a pinch of cinnamon.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 teaspoon prepared horseradish, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend tomatoes, celery, carrot, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, and hot sauce in a blender until very smooth. Add ice cubes and blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 3 cups honeydew melon - peeled, seeded and cubed
recipe_directions_formatted: Place the honeydew melon, ice cubes, grapes, cucumber, broccoli, and mint into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 8 sprigs fresh mint, or amount to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine cucumber, honeydew melon, passion fruit juice, and ice in a blender. Pull leaves from mint springs and add to blender. Blend mixture until smooth. Pour into tall glasses.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¾ cup almond milk, or more as needed
recipe_directions_formatted: Place almond milk, pumpkin puree, banana, protein powder, and pumpkin pie spice in a blender. Blend until smooth, 15 to 30 seconds. If mixture is too thick, add more almond milk or water to achieve desired consistency.

recipe_name: Don't Knock it Until You Try it Zucchini Chocolate Banana Nut Milkshake
recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 large ripe bananas, peeled and frozen
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend the zucchini, bananas, cocoa powder, peanuts, sugar, and half and half in a food processor until smooth, thick, and creamy.
Blend the carrot, banana, kiwi, apple, pineapple, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.
Prick yams with a fork, and place on a plate. Cook in the microwave for 8 to 10 minutes, turning once, until tender. Cool, peel and dice.
Combine the yams, yogurt, milk, ice cubes, sugar and banana in the container of a blender. Blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ⅔ cup chopped red bell pepper
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine banana, cucumbers, red bell pepper, grapefruit juice, and carrots in a blender; blend until smooth.
Fill a glass with ice and pour smoothie over ice.
Spoon pumpkin puree into a resealable bag and freeze, 8 hours to overnight.
Remove pumpkin from freezer and allow to soften at room temperature, 5 to 10 minutes.
Pour milk into the blender; add pumpkin, banana, brown sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth, about 3 minutes.
Place frozen pumpkin purée into a microwave-safe bowl. Heat in the microwave on high to soften, 1 to 2 minutes.
Pour milk into a blender. Add softened pumpkin purée, brown sugar, and cinnamon; blend until smooth.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake sweet potato in the preheated oven until tender and cooked through, about 1 hour. Remove skin, then cool in the refrigerator 8 hours to overnight.
Blend sweet potato, banana, soy milk, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth.
Blend almond milk, bananas, pumpkin, dates, protein powder, vanilla extract, nutmeg, cinnamon, cloves, and ginger together in a blender until smooth.
Peel pomelo and separate the fruit from the pith. Place fruit segments into a high performance blender (such as a Vitamix®). Blend on variable 1, quickly switching to variable 10. Blend for 1 minute.
Peel mango, remove pit, and cut into slices. Add to the blender and blend for another minute.
Cut oranges in half and squeeze juice into a small container. Strain to remove pulp, if desired, and pour juice into the blender. Add club soda and blend on high speed for 1 minute. Serve chilled.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup orange juice, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Pour orange juice into the pitcher of a blender and add mango, frozen banana, carrots, vanilla yogurt, ice cubes, and ginger. Pulse several times to crush ice, then blend until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1  medium firm banana, cut into 1-inch pieces
recipe_directions_formatted: Place pineapple, spinach, mango, peaches, banana, cucumber and chia seeds in a large resealable plastic bag or lidded container. Squeeze out the air. Freeze for up to 1 month.
When ready to blend, add contents of bag to blender. Add coconut milk and orange juice and blend on high until mixture is smooth. Serve immediately.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 ½ cups Almond Breeze Chocolate almondmilk
recipe_directions_formatted: Place all ingredients except Almond Breeze almondmilk in a small zip-top bag. Freeze until ready to use. To prepare smoothies, place the ingredients and Almond Breeze almondmilk in a blender and puree until smooth.
Combine soy milk, mango, vanilla protein powder, ginger, turmeric, nutmeg, and ice cubes in a blender cup; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 5  fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend strawberries, Greek yogurt, mango, milk, and protein powder together until smooth. Add mint leaves and pulse until leaves are chopped, 4 to 5 pulses.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 tablespoon Diced mango and shredded coconut for garnish
recipe_directions_formatted: Place the first four ingredients in Osteru® Versau® Performance Blender in order listed
Add 1 cup water.
Select programmed SMOOTHIE setting.
Serve immediately. Top with diced mango and coconut, if desired.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup white sugar, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend the basil, mango, strawberries, and water in a blender. Add sugar and ice cubes; blend again until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 4 teaspoons white sugar, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Place the yogurt, milk, mangoes, white sugar, and cardamom into the jar of a blender and blend until smooth, about 2 minutes. Chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour or until cold, and serve sprinkled with a little ground cardamom.
Blend mango, bananas, coconut milk, water, ice, sugar, coconut extract, and lime zest in a blender until smooth.
Blend the lemon yogurt, vanilla yogurt, milk, pureed mango, honey, mango nectar, and cardamom together in a blender until completely combined. Serve immediately.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 ½ cups chopped fresh or frozen peaches
¼ cup chopped and pitted nectarine
recipe_directions_formatted: Place mango, peaches, orange, nectarine, orange juice, and ice into a blender. Blend for 1 minute, or until smooth.
Place the mango, cottage cheese, ice cubes, orange juice, water, banana, honey, flax oil and vanilla in a blender. Blend for 2 minutes or until very smooth; serve immediately.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½  mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
½  fresh peach - peeled, pitted, and sliced
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend milk, orange juice, mango, peach, pineapple, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_name: Mango-Mint Lassi with Indian Sweet Spices
recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 large mango - peeled, seeded, and diced
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend the mango, brown sugar, chopped mint, star anise, cardamom, lime juice, and yogurt in a blender on high speed until smooth. Pour into glasses and garnish with fresh mint sprigs to serve.
Combine yogurt, mango chunks, mango juice, honey, vanilla extract, ground cardamom, ground cinnamon, and ground ginger in a blender; process until liquefied.
Blend watermelon, water, strawberries, mango, sugar, and lemon juice in a blender until smooth, about 5 minutes.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup white sugar, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Place the mango and papaya into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth; add the orange juice, lime juice, sugar, orange zest, and water. Blend well. Serve over crushed ice.
Combine mango, strawberries, and apple juice in a blender. Place ice over the fruit and pour in yogurt. Blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into a glass.
In a blender, combine mangos, yogurt, sugar and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup Almond Breeze Original or Unsweetened Original almondmilk
1 cup fresh or frozen mango cubes
1 cup fresh, frozen, or juice-packed pineapple chunks
1 tablespoon toasted slivered or sliced almonds (Optional)
recipe_directions_formatted: Puree all ingredients in a blender until smooth.
Purée mango, coconut milk, ice, pineapple juice, cream, and sugar in a blender until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.
Place mango, milk, honey, and ice cubes into a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
In a blender, blend the vanilla yogurt, pineapple juice, banana, mango, milk, and cream of coconut until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans mango pulp, or mango slices with juice
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend mango pulp, yogurt, milk, and ice in a blender until smooth.
Blend banana, mango, juice, and yogurt in a blender until nearly smooth.
Combine mango, frozen strawberries, yogurt, pineapple juice, and frozen blueberries in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup fresh or frozen mango cubes
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine mango and pineapple juice in a blender; blend until smooth. Set aside.

Rub lime wedge around the rim of a glass, then dip in 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning. Juice lime into the glass; add 1 tablespoon chamoy and remaining 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning. Pour 1/2 of the mango-pineapple mixture into the prepared glass. Add remaining 1 tablespoon chamoy sauce and top with remaining mango-pineapple mixture.
Blend cherries, mango, water, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup orange juice, or as needed
recipe_directions_formatted: Place peach, mango, soy milk, and orange juice into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.
Combine mangoes, ice cubes, vanilla extract, and sugar in a blender; pour in milk. Blend until liquefied.
Blend orange juice, mango, banana, yogurt, and oats together in a blender until smooth.
Blend watermelon, mango, water, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.
Place ice into glasses and pour smoothie over ice.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 tablespoons peanut butter, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend yogurt, banana, mango, and peanut butter together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 ½ cups mangos - peeled, seeded, chopped, and chilled
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine mangos, yogurt, milk, cream, confectioners' sugar, and cardamom in a blender; blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
Blend the milk, yogurt, vanilla extract, mango, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth and creamy.
Place 1 teaspoon chamoy on a plate. Place 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning on another plate. Dip rim of glass first in chamoy, then in chili-lime seasoning. Set aside.
Combine frozen mango, water, and lime juice in a blender; blend until smooth.
Place 1/2 tablespoon chamoy in the bottom of the glass. Add 1/2 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning and 1/2 of the blended mangoes. Repeat layers and top with diced fresh mango.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 3 ounces baby carrots, cut into chunks
recipe_directions_formatted: Pour soy milk and flax seeds into a blender. Allow flax seeds to soften, 1 to 3 minutes. Turn blender on and add yogurt, strawberries, banana, carrots, and coconut, blending well after each addition. Add blueberries and blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 7 leaves basil, or more to taste
2 (1 gram) packets stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine blueberries, water, basil, lime juice, and sweetener in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup coconut water, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine coconut water, banana, blueberries, kale, spinach, dates, almond butter, hemp seed hearts, flax seeds, oats, and protein powder in a blender. Cover and puree until smooth. Top with graham cracker crumbs.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 3 cubes  ice, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine blueberries, yogurt, juice, ice, and flax seeds in a blender; blend until smooth.

Blend milk, half-and-half, sugar, lemon extract, and cinnamon in a blender; add blueberries and blend until thick and smooth. Blend vanilla wafers and ice cubes into milk mixture until desired consistency is reached.

Place 1 cup strawberries in a blender; blend on ice crush setting until smooth. Add the remaining 1/2 cup strawberries, soy milk, and blueberries; blend until well combined. Add acai powder, flaxseed oil, and stevia with a spoon. Blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1  grapefruit - peeled, seeds removed, and white pith removed
recipe_directions_formatted: Mix grapefruit, rice milk, blueberries, yogurt, oats, banana, kiwi, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.
Combine milk, frozen blueberries, oats, lemon juice, honey, and ginger in a blender; process until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 cubes  ice, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine blueberries, almond milk, banana, ice cubes, oats, almond butter, acai powder, vanilla extract, and maple syrup in a blender; blend until smooth.
Blend blueberries, milk, yogurt, kiwi, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup water, or more as needed
½  green apple, cored and chopped
3  frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece peeled fresh ginger, cut into thirds
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend water, blueberries, grapes, apple, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and slushy.
Combine bananas, almond milk, blueberries, and strawberries in a blender and puree until smooth, adding oats just before you have almost reached your desired texture. Blend until oats are mixed in.
Combine banana, blueberries, vanilla yogurt, strawberries, cherries, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth, about 60 seconds.
In a blender, combine blueberries, apples, raspberries, grapes, sugar and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
Place the orange juice, pineapple juice, yogurt, blueberries, strawberries, and bananas into a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. The berry drink will be very thick. Serve immediately.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup ice cubes, or as desired
½ cup frozen blueberries, or to taste
1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend ice in a blender until crumbly; add yogurt, milk, blueberries, and cinnamon. Blend until smooth. Taste smoothie and add desired amount of sugar; blend.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup water, or more as needed
4  frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend water, blueberries, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 tablespoon vanilla yogurt, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine milk, blueberries, ice cubes, banana, vanilla yogurt, peanut butter, and chocolate protein powder in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2  frozen bananas, skins removed and cut in chunks
recipe_directions_formatted: Place bananas, blueberries and juice in a blender, puree. Use honey and/or vanilla to taste. Use more or less liquid depending on the thickness you want for your smoothie.
Process the cranberry juice, strawberries, blueberries, watermelon, banana, and figs in a blender until smooth and creamy. Enjoy immediately or keep cool in refrigerator.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
1 cup frozen blueberries, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Pour prune juice into a blender. Layer Greek yogurt, spinach, blueberries, strawberries, peach, and flax seeds in the blender, in this order. Start blender on low speed and gradually increase speed until smoothie is well blended.

recipe_name: Purple Power Punch Smoothie (My Kids' Fave)
recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup nonfat vanilla yogurt (such as Dannon® Light and Fit®)
¼ cup blueberries, or to taste
¼ cup raspberries, or to taste
¼ cup blackberries, or to taste
3 tablespoons turbinado sugar (such as Sugar in the Raw®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Pulse yogurt, strawberries, water, powdered milk, banana, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries, and protein powder together in a blender until well-mixed. Add ice, sugar, and honey and blend until smooth.

recipe_name: Avocado, Blueberry, Banana, and Chia Smoothie
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine almond milk, avocado, blueberries, banana, ice, and chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_name: Strawberry and Blueberry Oatmeal Health Shake
recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup vanilla and honey Greek yogurt (such as Chobani®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine blueberries, milk, strawberries, sugar, oats, and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth. Add ice; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend soy milk, banana, blueberries, oats, chia seeds, vanilla extract, and white sugar together in a blender until smooth.
In a blender, blend the kiwi, banana, blueberries, strawberries, ice, orange juice, and yogurt until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup low-fat plain Greek-style yogurt
¼ cup granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend blueberries, pomegranate juice, yogurt, milk, oats, sweetener, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth, about 2 minutes.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1  frozen banana, thawed for 10 to 15 minutes
recipe_directions_formatted: Cut banana into small pieces and place into the bowl of a blender. Add the soy milk, yogurt, flax seed meal, and honey. Blend on lowest speed until smooth, about 5 seconds. Gradually add the blueberries while continuing to blend on low. Once the blueberries have been incorporated, increase speed, and blend to desired consistency.
Pour almond milk into a high-frequency blender (such as Vitamix®). Add cherries, strawberries, grapes, blueberries, and turmeric.
Secure lid, and turn onto variable speed 1. Increase speed to variable 10. Blend for 30 to 45 seconds.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup mixed berry fruit juice
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend ice cubes in a blender until crushed. Pour in water and juice; blend.
Add frozen raspberries, mixed berries, and blueberries; blend until smooth. Pour into chilled glasses.
Place berries into a blender with milk, pomegranate and mango juices, and honey. Cover and purée until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1  banana, cut into chunks and frozen
½ cup low-fat plain Greek-style yogurt
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend blueberries, grape juice, banana, yogurt, ice, and honey in a blender until smooth, at least 3 minutes.
Combine blueberries, banana, almond milk, and almond butter in a blender; blend until smooth, adding water for a thinner smoothie.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 ¼ cups unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk, divided
1 teaspoon maple syrup, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine oats and 2/3 cup almond milk in a bowl; cover and refrigerate until milk is absorbed by oats, 8 hours to overnight.
Combine oats-almond milk mixture, remaining almond milk, banana, blueberries, vanilla, and maple syrup in a blender; blend until smooth.
Pour smoothie into 2 bowls, then top with coconut, blueberries, and chia seeds.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼  avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend blueberries, yogurt, almond milk, water, and avocado in a blender until smooth.
Blend blueberries, 1/2 banana, water, cashew butter, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl.
Top smoothie with sliced banana, almonds, and coconut.
Blend almond milk, strawberries, blueberries, yogurt, flax seed oil, and agave nectar in a blender until smooth.

Pour cream and half-and-half into an electric blender and blend on low speed until it begins to thicken. Add sugar and vanilla extract and mix for about 30 seconds. Add blueberries, strawberries, raspberries, and blackberries. Blend until smooth, adding milk if necessary to make blending easier.
Pour pineapple juice into a blender and add banana, strawberries, and blueberries. Cover and blend until smooth, about 1 minute. Pour into 2 glasses.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend blueberries, yogurt, orange juice, sugar, vanilla extract, and cinnamon together in a blender on low speed for 30 seconds; increase speed to high and blend until smooth, about 2 minutes. Add ice and blend on high until smooth, about 1 minute more.
Blend the ice, banana, maple syrup, brown sugar, eggnog, orange juice, and vanilla yogurt together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (15.25 ounce) can mango slices with juice
recipe_directions_formatted: Place coconut milk, mango slices with their juice, orange juice, and sugar into a blender, and blend until smooth; add the shaved ice, and blend again. Pour into 4 glasses, and top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkling of shaved milk chocolate.
In an electric blender, mix together orange juice, kiwi, bananas, pineapple, and pineapple juice until well blended. Pour the mixture into a pitcher.
Place the ice in the blender, then pour the fruit mixture over the ice. Process until the ice is blended in with the fruit juices.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
recipe_directions_formatted: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, water, vanilla, sugar and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
recipe_directions_formatted: In a blender combine milk, water, orange juice concentrate, ice cubes, vanilla and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into three 12 oz glasses and enjoy with a straw.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
recipe_directions_formatted: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, water, sugar, vanilla and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
recipe_directions_formatted: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, water, sugar and vanilla. Add ice cubes and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 ½ cups ice, or as desired
1 (6 ounce) container Key lime-flavored Greek yogurt
1 tablespoon heavy whipping cream, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend ice, yogurt, banana, cream, and orange juice together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
recipe_directions_formatted: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, sugar, vanilla and ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup freshly squeezed orange juice
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine coconut cream, orange juice, and ginger in a blender. Blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (16 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
recipe_directions_formatted: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, cream, carbonated water, confectioners' sugar, vanilla and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup freshly squeezed orange juice
1 cup fresh or frozen pitted sweet cherries
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine all ingredients in a blender and process until smooth.
Blend the strawberries, orange pieces, apple juice, vanilla yogurt, and almonds together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 large navel orange, peeled and cut into chunks
¼ cup low-fat vanilla Greek yogurt
2 ½ tablespoons sweetened shredded coconut, divided
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine orange chunks, yogurt, orange juice, almond milk, 2 tablespoons coconut, brown sugar, and vanilla extract in a blender; process until smooth. Add ice cubes and puree until smooth and thick. Divide between 2 glasses and garnish with remaining coconut.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 teaspoon honey, or more to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend ice, orange, limes, lemon, kiwi, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

Cut two 1/4 inch thick slices from the peeled dragon fruit to use as a garnish; set aside. Place the remaining dragon fruit into a blender along with the tangerine segments, lime juice, basil, brown sugar, and sparkling water. Puree until smooth. Stir in the crushed ice, and pour into glasses. Garnish with the reserved dragon fruit slices to serve.
In a blender, combine strawberries, orange juice, ice cubes, and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
Combine the orange juice, milk, sugar, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1  banana, cut into pieces and frozen
recipe_directions_formatted: Place the nectarines, frozen banana chunks, orange, vanilla yogurt, orange juice, and honey into a blender, and blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ¼ cup white sugar, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend yogurt, peaches, bananas, orange juice, sugar, and ice in a blender on high until the ice is crushed and the smoothie is to your desired consistency.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 ½ ounces dark chocolate bar (such as Hershey's® Special Dark), broken into pieces
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine almond milk, banana, dark chocolate, and protein powder in a blender; blend until smooth.

Mash bananas and brown sugar together in a bowl. Transfer to a small saucepan, place over medium heat and cook until bananas begin to brown, about 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Gradually mix 1 cup of milk into bananas and heat until mixture begins to steam. Stir honey and cinnamon into mixture until honey has dissolved.

Pour banana mixture into a blender no more than half full. Cover and hold the lid down; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend. Purée until smooth. Blend remaining 1/2 cup of milk into mixture until creamy.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ cup strong brewed coffee, chilled
⅓ cup chocolate-flavored whey protein powder
1 tablespoon unsalted natural peanut butter, or more to taste

Blend banana, milk, coconut cream, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.

recipe_name: Dairy-Free Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie

recipe_directions_formatted: Blend coconut milk, banana, peanut butter, and honey in a blender until smooth, about 1 minute. Add ice and blend again until ice is crushed, 2 to 3 minutes.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ teaspoon freshly squeezed lime juice
1 sprig fresh chocolate mint, finely chopped
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend banana, orange juice, mango, pineapple, coconut water, lime juice, and mint in a blender until smooth.

Blend almond milk, oats, strawberries, banana, agave nectar, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
recipe_directions_formatted: Put banana, ice, oats, yogurt, skim milk, peanut butter, honey, and cinnamon, respectively, in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup nonfat Greek yogurt (such as Chobani®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Place yogurt, avocado, and banana in a blender and purée until smooth. Add water for a thinner smoothie.

Combine yogurt, bananas, strawberries, wheat germ, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth, about 1 minute.
In a blender, combine banana, chocolate syrup, milk and crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
Place the bananas, figs, milk, and orange juice into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 medium Gala apple, peeled, cored and chopped
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine apple, frozen banana, orange juice, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

recipe_directions_formatted: Blend together milk, frozen banana, peanut butter, cocoa powder, and honey in a blender until smooth.
Place yogurt, peanut butter, banana, strawberries, and ice cubes into a blender. Puree until smooth.

recipe_directions_formatted: Put flaxseed meal into a blender to grind and further break down.

recipe_directions_formatted: Place juice blend, frozen yogurt, banana, strawberries, and kiwi into a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into 2 glasses.

Combine bananas, milk, ice cubes, cocoa powder, peanut butter, and vanilla in a blender; blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses.

recipe_directions_formatted: Blend strawberries, orange juice, banana, and ice in a blender until smooth and frothy.
Place strawberries, banana, almonds, and water into a blender; blend to combine. Add ice cubes and puree until smooth. Add protein powder and mix until evenly incorporated, about 30 seconds.
Combine mangos, banana, vanilla yogurt, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_directions_formatted: Blend milk, strawberries, yogurt, chocolate-flavored malt drink mix, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (5.3 ounce) container Yoplait® Greek 100 Vanilla Yogurt, divided
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine the strawberries, half the banana, 1/2 container of yogurt, milk and honey (if using) in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses and rinse out the blender.

1 (15 ounce) can cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend pineapple, strawberries, cream of coconut, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ⅓ cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend almond milk, banana, strawberries, yogurt, oats, and almonds together in a NutriBullet® or blender until smooth.

Blend almond milk, banana, strawberries, ice cubes, protein powder, vanilla extract, honey, ground flax seeds, ground chia seeds, and cinnamon in a blender until smooth.

recipe_directions_formatted: Combine strawberries, yogurt, almond milk, and frozen cherries in a blender; add ice. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup frozen strawberries, slightly thawed and chopped
¼ cup chopped cilantro, leaves and stems, lightly packed
recipe_directions_formatted: Combine strawberries, banana, almond milk, ice, cilantro, lime juice, and stevia powder in a blender. Process until smooth, adding more almond milk or water for a smoother consistency.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 cup Almond Breeze Original or Unsweetened Original almondmilk
½ cup fresh or juice packed pineapple
recipe_directions_formatted: Puree all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 2 bananas, cut into chunks and frozen
recipe_directions_formatted: In a blender, combine bananas, strawberries, chocolate syrup, and yogurt. Blend until smooth.

Combine mango, papaya, strawberries, orange juice, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ½ (16 ounce) can pineapple chunks, undrained
recipe_directions_formatted: Blend pineapple, reserved pineapple juice, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: 1 (8.3 ounce) can citrus flavored energy drink (e.g. Red Bull™)
recipe_directions_formatted: In the container of a blender, combine the energy drink and frozen strawberries. Blend until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute. Add some water if blending is difficult. Pour into 2 big glasses.
Blend oats and chia seeds together in a blender to a fine consistency. Add strawberries, yogurt, banana, almond milk, and vanilla extract; blend until smooth.

Cut 3 strawberries into small pieces and set aside. In a blender, place the remaining strawberries and sugar; blend on high speed for 30 seconds. Pour in the milk and blend another 30 seconds. Add the yogurt and blend on high speed for 1 minute.
To serve, place 1 ice cube in each of 3 glasses and pour in the lassi. Top with the strawberry pieces and serve.

Combine milk, strawberries, honey, and vanilla in a blender. Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.
Combine strawberries, milk, yogurt, sugar, and vanilla in a blender. Add ice and blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

recipe_ingredients_formatted: ⅓ cup orange pineapple apple juice blend (such as Welch’s®)
recipe_directions_formatted: Add banana, mango, strawberries, juice, and coconut water to a blender. Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape sides as needed. Pour into a glass; garnish with fresh strawberry.
